lead_paragraph: Luckyrice, in partnership with the Japanese Culinary Center, is throwing a sake tasting event Friday at the Metropolitan Pavilion, 123 West 18th Street (between Sixth and Seventh Avenues), in Chelsea. Artisanal brewers will be offering tastings paired with bites from local restaurants. Tickets are $50 for entry at 7 p.m. but V.I.P. tickets, $80, afford you access an hour earlier. Online tickets are only available until 2 p.m. but there will be some tickets available, cash only, at the door.
